title: Access your files, anywhere
description: The ability to use a smartphone, tablet, or computer to access your account  means your files follow you everywhere.

title: Security you can trust
description: 2-factor authentication and user controlled encryption are just a couple of security features we allow to help secure your files.

title: Real-time collaboration
description: Securely share files and folders with friends, family and colleagues for live collaboration. No email attachments required.

title: Store any type of file
description: Wether you're sharing holidays photos or work documents, Fylo has you covered allowing for all file types to be securely stored and shared.
